Package info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.common

Class ComboBoxOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.common.ComboBoxOption
  • public class ComboBoxOption
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows for easy creation and predictable interaction with items/options used set in a javafx.scene.control.ComboBox.

    • Method Detail

      • getComboBoxConverter

        public static javafx.util.StringConverter<ComboBoxOption> getComboBoxConverter​(java.util.List<ComboBoxOption> options)
        Gets a javafx.util.StringConverter that can be used with a javafx.scene.control.ComboBox. This converter configures the combo box to work with the interface of this class. A Stream and Lambda are used within the created converter to increase the readability of the filter operation that occurs when converting a string to a ComboBoxOption.
        Parameters:
        options - Reference to the list of options that will be used in the combo box being configured
        Returns:
        Converter for the combo box being configured
